changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE user ( id BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, userId VARCHAR(255), firstName VARCHAR(255), lastName VARCHAR(255), userName VARCHAR(255), password VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, profileImageUrl VARCHAR(500), lastLoginDate DATE, lastLoginDateDisplay DATE, joinDate DATE, role VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, isActive BOOLEAN, isNotLocked BOOLEAN, CONSTRAINT PK_id PRIMARY KEY (id) );
